examples.example: 太阳每天升起，给世界带来光明和温暖。

translate.english: The sun rises every day, bringing light and warmth to the world.

examples.example: 太阳照耀着大地，让万物充满生机与活力。

translate.english: The sun shines on the earth, making all things full of vitality and energy.

examples.example: 灿烂的太阳高高挂在天空，给人们带来无限的希望和快乐。

translate.english: The brilliant sun hangs high in the sky, bringing people unlimited hope and happiness.
